running_mode_comment0: 0 : complete can information, only use can
running_mode_comment1: 1 : no can information, use imu + gps
running_mode_comment2: 2 : uncomplete can information, no gps, use imu + can speed

imu_setting.install_posture_comment0: 0 : read imu install posture from this json
imu_setting.install_posture_comment1: 1 : calculate imu install when the program starts running
imu_setting.install_gyro_offset_comment0: 0 : read gyro offset from this json
imu_setting.install_gyro_offset_comment1: 1 : calculate gyro offset when the program starts running
